name: ABDUL BAQI QURESHI
title: Software Engineer
bio: Fresh Software Engineering graduate from Quaid-e-Awam University of Engineering Sciences and Technology, Nawabshah, with practical experience in full-stack web development, blockchain, and AI/ML. Skilled in Python, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Firebase, Django, Ethereum blockchain, Solidity smart contracts, and Python ML libraries such as TensorFlow and scikit-learn. Experienced in Agile methodology, version control with Git, and continuous integration/deployment practices. Passionate about leveraging technology to build innovative, efficient software solutions.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Developed IoT Smart Home Monitoring dashboard using Firebase and sensor data. Employed Agile and Git workflows.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
experience.description: Delivered AI-Powered Medical Diagnostic Assistant with Python ML and Streamlit; managed client communication and deployment.

experience.title: Academic & Personal Projects
experience.description: Built blockchain DApps, AI tools, and full-stack apps utilizing React.js, Node.js, Solidity, OpenAI API with continuous integration.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E) in Software Engineering
education.institution: Quaid-e-Awam University of Engineering Sciences and Technology, Nawabshah
education.description: Final Year Project: Decentralized Voting System using Ethereum Blockchain. CGPA: 3.39 / 4.00
